quote: I believe that one of life's greatest risks is never daring to risk. – Oprah Winfrey
fact: To Ensure Promptness, one is expected to pay beyond the value of service – hence the later abbreviation: T.I.P.
tip: Use keyboard shortcuts to save time.
joke: What did the pirate say on his 80th birthday? Aye Matey!
